testsuite.name: Typed Auth Kafka Client Tests

testcase.name: Handle response - ignores unknown correlation ID
Send request - handles Kafka send failure
Handle response - completes exceptionally for type mismatch
Get client UID - sends correct command
Handle response - completes future for matching correlation ID

testsuite.system-out: 01:35:56.747 [ForkJoinPool-1-worker-1] WARN com.connection.device.kafka.TypedAuthKafkaClient -- Received response for unknown correlationId: unknown-correlation-id 01:35:57.134 [ForkJoinPool-1-worker-1] ERROR com.connection.device.kafka.TypedAuthKafkaClient -- Failed to send command: Kafka error 01:35:57.146 [ForkJoinPool-1-worker-1] WARN com.connection.device.kafka.TypedAuthKafkaClient -- Type mismatch for correlationId: 09734615-c561-41fd-8c2d-0a49df3e0a42. Expected: class com.connection.auth.events.responses.TokenValidationResponse, Got: class com.connection.auth.events.responses.ClientUidResponse
